name: Chicken Shawarma Wrap
description: Marinated chicken strips grilled to perfection, wrapped in a soft pita with garlic sauce, pickles, and fresh vegetables.

name: Lamb Kofta Kebab
description: Seasoned ground lamb shaped into skewers and grilled over an open flame, served with flatbread and tzatziki sauce.

name: Beef Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender beef, fragrant spices, and herbs, garnished with fried onions and cilantro.

name: Falafel Plate
description: Crispy chickpea patties served with hummus, tabbouleh, and warm pita bread.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Grilled chicken pieces simmered in a rich, creamy tomato sauce, served with basmati rice.

name: Grilled Chicken Burger
description: Juicy grilled chicken breast topped with lettuce, tomato, and a tangy sauce, served in a toasted bun.

name: Spicy Chicken Sandwich
description: Crispy fried chicken with a spicy coating, topped with pickles and mayo in a soft bun.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm, gooey chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Mango Lassi
description: A refreshing yogurt-based drink blended with ripe mangoes and a hint of cardamom.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: Crispy pizza crust topped with a variety of fresh vegetables, mozzarella cheese, and tomato sauce.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy battered fish fillets served with golden fries and tartar sauce.

name: BBQ Chicken Wings
description: Tender chicken wings coated in a smoky BBQ sauce, served with a side of ranch dressing.

name: Cheesy Fries
description: Crispy fries topped with melted cheese and jalapenos.

name: Veggie Wrap
description: A soft tortilla filled with grilled vegetables, hummus, and a drizzle of tahini sauce.

name: Turkey Club Sandwich
description: Sliced turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo layered between toasted bread.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Golden brown bread filled with melted cheddar cheese, grilled to perfection.

name: Chicken Quesadilla
description: Grilled tortilla stuffed with chicken, cheese, and a mix of peppers and onions, served with salsa and sour cream.

name: Garlic Breadsticks
description: Soft breadsticks brushed with garlic butter and sprinkled with parmesan cheese.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A hearty plant-based patty topped with lettuce, tomato, and avocado, served in a toasted bun.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Crispy romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, and parmesan cheese, tossed in Caesar dressing.
